00096     template<typename T>
00097     T permuteColumns(const T& A, const std::vector<uint>& indices) {
00098       if (indices.size() != A.cols())
00099         throw(std::logic_error("indices to permuteColumns must match the size of the matrix"));
00100 
00101       T B(A.rows(), A.cols());
00102 
00103       for (uint i=0; i<A.cols(); ++i) {
00104         if (indices[i] > A.cols())
00105           throw(std::out_of_range("Permutation index is out of bounds"));
00106         for (uint j=0; j<A.rows(); ++j)
00107           B(j, i) = A(j, indices[i]);
00108       }
00109 
00110       return(B);
00111     }
00112 
00114     template<typename T>
00115     T permuteRows(const T& A, const std::vector<uint>& indices) {
00116       if (indices.size() != A.rows())
00117         throw(std::logic_error("indices to permuteRows must match the size of the matrix"));
00118 
00119       T B(A.rows(), A.cols());
00120 
00121       for (uint j=0; j<A.rows(); ++j) {
00122         if (indices[j] > A.rows())
00123           throw(std::out_of_range("Permutation index is out of bounds"));
00124         for (uint i=0; i<A.cols(); ++i)
00125           B(j, i) = A(indices[j], i);
00126       }
00127 
00128       return(B);
00129     }
00130 
00131     template<typename T>
00132     void reverseColumns(T& A) {
00133       uint m = A.rows();
00134       uint n = A.cols();
00135       uint k = n / 2;
00136 
00137       for (uint i=0; i<k; ++i)
00138         for (uint j=0; j<m; ++j)
00139           std::swap(A(j,i), A(j,n-i-1));
00140     }
00141 
00142     template<typename T>
00143     void reverseRows(T& A) {
00144       uint m = A.rows();
00145       uint n = A.cols();
00146       uint k = m / 2;
00147 
00148       for (uint j=0; j<k; ++j)
00149         for (uint i=0; i<n; ++i)
00150           std::swap(A(j, i), A(m-j-1, i));
00151     }

00155     namespace {
00156       template<typename T>
00157       double colDotProd(const T& A, const uint i, const T& B, const uint j) {
00158         double sum = 0.0;
00159         for (uint k=0; k<A.rows(); ++k)
00160           sum += A(k,i) * B(k,j);
00161         return(sum);
00162       }
00163     }
00164     
00165     template<typename T>
00166     double subspaceOverlap(const T& A, const T& B, uint nmodes = 0) {
00167       if (A.rows() != B.rows())
00168         throw(NumericalError("subspaceOverlap: Matrices have different dimensions"));
00169 
00170       if (nmodes == 0)
00171         nmodes = A.cols();
00172       if (nmodes > A.cols() || nmodes > B.cols())
00173         throw(NumericalError("Requested number of modes exceeds matrix dimensions"));
00174       
00175       double sum = 0.0;
00176       for (uint i=0; i<nmodes; ++i)
00177         for (uint j=0; j<nmodes; ++j) {
00178           double d = colDotProd(A, i, B, j);
00179           sum += d*d;
00180         }
00181 
00182       return(sum / nmodes);
00183     }
00184

00210     template<typename T>
00211     double covarianceOverlap(const T& lamA, const T& UA, const T& lamB, const T& UB) {
00212       if (!(UA.rows() == UB.rows() && lamA.rows() <= UA.cols() && lamB.rows() <= UB.cols()))
00213         throw(NumericalError("covarianceOverlap: Matrices have incorrect dimensions"));
00214 
00215       double lamsum = 0.0;
00216       for (uint i=0; i<lamA.rows(); ++i)
00217         lamsum += lamA[i];
00218       for (uint i=0; i<lamB.rows(); ++i)
00219         lamsum += lamB[i];
00220 
00221       double dblsum = 0.0;
00222       for (uint i=0; i<lamA.rows(); ++i)
00223         for (uint j=0; j<lamB.rows(); ++j) {
00224           double d = colDotProd(UA, i, UB, j);
00225           dblsum += sqrt(lamA[i]*lamB[j]) * d * d;
00226         }
00227       
00228 
00229       double num = lamsum - 2.0 * dblsum;
00230       double co = 1.0 - sqrt( fabs(num) / lamsum );
00231 
00232       return(co);
00233     }
